knowledgeGraph.title: National Domestic Violence Hotline
knowledgeGraph.type: Languages: English, Spanish and 200+ through interpretation serviceHours: 24/7Call 800-799-7233 | Text BEGIN to 88788 | Chat | Official Website

organic.title: National Domestic Violence Hotline: Domestic Violence Support
organic.snippet: Everyone deserves relationships free from domestic violence. When you're ready, we're here to listen with confidential support 24/7/365.

organic.title: Contact Our Staff - South Valley Services
organic.snippet: For emergency shelter or general questions call our 24-hour hotline 801-255-1095 or TTY: 801-870-5018 West Jordan Community Resource Center 8000 S Redwood ...

organic.title: South Valley Services - Home
organic.snippet: South Valley Services is a domestic violence service provider in the Salt Lake Area. We provide safe shelter and services to men, women and children.

organic.title: Get Help Now - South Valley Services
organic.snippet: Do you need help for domestic violence? There are options for you. If you need immediate emergency assistance, please call 911 What to do if you need help ...

organic.title: South Valley Services - UOVC - ConcernCenter
